IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT HERNAKULAM 2019/KER/758
PRESENT
THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR
TUESDAY ,THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 18TH POUSHA, 1940
Cr1.MC.No. 130 of 2019
AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN LP 19/2007 of J.M.F.C.-II,
MANANTHAVADY

ASHOKAN

S/O BALAN ,KANNAMVELI HOUSE, KECHERY,

SRI.I.DINESH MENON

STATE OF KERALA
REPRESENTED BY SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE,
MANANTHAVADY POLICE STATION, THROUGH THE PUBLIC
PROSECUTOR,HIGH COURT OF KERALA,
ERNAKULAM- 682031.
BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, SRI E C BINEESH
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
08.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Buea
Plz
2019/KER/758
Cr1.MC.No. 130 of 2019
2
ORDER

Heard.

In view of the limited nature of the prayer, it is
directed that if the petitioner surrenders before the
court below within twenty days in L.P.No.19 of 2007
and applies for regular bail, the court below shall
consider and dispose of the application for bail, in
accordance with law, on the date of surrender itself.

This Crl.M.C. stands disposed of as above.

Ssd/-
B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR
RK/08.01.2018 JUDGE
